Understate: The claim understates the fact that only new coins, and not new banknotes, have been released by the Central Bank of Kenya.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no concrete evidence provided for the release of new banknotes.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the images shared on social media represent the actual new banknotes, which may not be the case.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the new banknotes have not been released yet.
Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation could be that the images shared on social media are not accurate representations of the new banknotes.
